div.p: Quixote architecture and conversion workflow. The user instructs Lensfield2 to convert output files of different computational chemistry codes into semantically rich CML files. The conversion is performed by JUMBO-Converters following the hints provided in the dictionaries and templates. The generated CML files are then transferred to one or more local and remote chem# repositories using a RESTful web API. The user can search and browse those repositories with a web browser, and can also manipulate and visualize the CML files with Avogadro.
